original_text: Because they have committed villany in Israel, and have committed adultery with their neighbours' wives, and have spoken lying words in my name, which I have not commanded them; even I know, and am a witness, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 이스라엘 중에서 어리석게 행하여 그 이웃의 아내와 간음하며 내가 그들에게 명령하지 아니한 거짓을 내 이름으로 말함이라 나는 알고 있는 자로서 증인이니라 여호와의 말씀이니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Because they have committed villany in Israel
and have committed adultery with their neighbours' wives
and have spoken lying words in my name
which I have not commanded them
even I know, and am a witness
